xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/689657-Blue Movie 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yj5GhWX21jrlCVLzvNufSM4fsD8.jpg For Blue Movie Agnieszka Brzeżańska invited other women artists in her circle to perform as nudes in an empty dark space to a track by Blondie. The resulting film is an impro-vised free dance of shadows of female bodies. The nudes are captured in casual, graceful or discreetly suggestive poses. one senses a touch of ‘70s psychedelia and pop aesthetic. At the same time, they are reminsicent of a more austere context – the abstract studies of Matisse or the late esoteric nudes of Yves Klein. Blue Movie
